text: The Eve of St. Mark is a 1944 American World War II fantasy movie directed by John M. Stahl and was based on the 1942 play of the same name by Maxwell Anderson. It stars Vincent Price, Harry Morgan, Ruth Nelson, Anne Baxter and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1944 war movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:American war movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by John M. Stahl
title: The Eve of St. Mark
